name: Miriam Komunda
bio: Former urban planning director with 18 years in community development. Led municipal redevelopment initiatives in three cities before founding Banor.

name: Mr Keon
bio: Construction and real estate veteran. 15 years in affordable housing and market-rate development. Oversees all property acquisition and rehabilitation.

name: Ruth Komunda
bio: Education and workforce development leader. Former VP of a national youth employment nonprofit. Builds certification tracks and employer partnerships.

name: Mr Kalvn Karungi
bio: Impact investing and structured finance. Previously led impact fund at a national bank. Responsible for capital raising and deployment strategy.

name: Jackie Kaweesi
bio: Operations and scaling expert. Managed growth at two high-impact nonprofits. Ensures integrated operations across Foundation, Development, and Capital.
